marklogic.body: Well an unarmed man was murdered. And seems like all con-servatives are just jumping the bandwagon defending this contemptuous Act of Cold blooded murder as self defense. I can bet you dollars to donuts, had the races been reversed, white con-servative christian lunatics would be screaming bloody murder at the top of their lungs. Zimmerman, whatever race he maybe...deserves to be arrested and thrown in jail for at least 30 years! This was NO self defence, it was murder! Coulter and her ilk are the biggest hypocrites and talk about comedy gold, nothing says it better than an ugly pale skinned talk bony she-male horse-faced minger with an Adam's apple! Little wonder why she does not have a boyfriend or a husband.
